italic.text: To disengage from enemies, breaking contact with the enemy and moving to a point where the enemy can neither observe nor engage the unit by direct fire.

line.text: In SWORD, disengaging from enemies or a threat is to move toward a given position, with a very high priority. In this mission the agent tries to reach the issued position at all cost. The position is chosen and issued by the user.
